TopicTitle: [1.1] KSP process hang immediately after staging

Articles.Content:
I'm unclear if this is the same issue as related to:  http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/8241

This bug has happened several times immediately follow staging. I haven't found a pattern other than that. The process immediately hangs and must be force-terminated.

Here's a Windows Error Report on the hang:
